mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.name as t_name, t.exway as t_exway, t.rules as t_rules, t.sourcetable as t_sourcetable, t.goaltable as t_goaltable, t.querys as t_querys, t.counts as t_counts, t.fromtime as t_fromtime, t.totime as t_totime, t.successflag as t_successflag, t.errlog as t_errlog, t.cleancount as t_cleancount, t.checkcount as t_checkcount, t.simplewashcolumn as t_simplewashcolumn
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from wash_log t
order by ${orderByClause}
select IFNULL(sum(counts), 0) AS s from wash_log where TO_DAYS(fromtime)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) and successflag = 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into wash_log (id, name, exway, rules, sourcetable, goaltable, querys, counts, fromtime, totime, successflag, errlog, cleancount, checkcount, simplewashcolumn ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exway,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rules,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcetable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goaltable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{querys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{counts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fromtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{successflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{errlog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cleancount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{simplewashcolumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update wash_log t
t.id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t.name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.exway = #{record.exway,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t.rules = #{record.rules,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

t.checkcount = #{record.checkcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t.simplewashcolumn = #{record.simplewashcolumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update wash_log
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exway = #{exway,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rules = #{rules,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sourcetable = #{sourcetable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
